name: Doraiz the Templar-EPISODE 0- Chaotic Countdown to Destruction
name_original: Doraiz the Templar-EPISODE 0- Chaotic Countdown to Destruction
description:
Doraiz the Templar is the first in a series of multi-media projects!

 The Game- Chaotic Countdown to Destruction serves as a prequel episode, kicking off  the rpgmaker game series off with a blast!

Story: Our story begins as Doraiz battles against the forces of Chaos, only to mysteriously vanish...

Now, four months have passed with no sign of the Templar, and the Galactic Allied Federation (GAF) must ensure that a difficult peace ceremony on a neutral world goes down without any problems. Enter Inspector Squad Delta 224: a rookie tag-team of elite agents - Rook Anderson, Liara Tel'varia and Sega Masasysem must ensure that nothing goes wrong without fighting amongst themselves!  

Can these unlikely heroes defy fate and save the universe? Or will they fail and all fall unto the Corruption?

*included in the game folder is a short Primer on the world of Doraiz the Templar aswell as character info, however becareful as this will contain spoilers!)
